scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises several documents related to the geneaology of prominent Kentucky families including the Hunts, Morgans, Keys, Harts, Andersons, Charltons, Grosches, and Howards with notes about individuals, handwritten family geneaologies and histories, letters clarifying family relations, numerous family trees, and Mrs. Ellen Key Howard Morgan's application to the Maryland Society of the Colonial Dames of America including details of several generations of her ancestors.
